page.title: 10HOME LIFE IN LINTON
page.content: A lot of people in Linton have pets. The most common pets are dogs,cats and rabbits.The majority of people have children.Most people,for tea have a starter,main course and dessert.When people do their domestic activities they mostly do cooking, washing, gardening,housework and socializing. In 1985 people eat lots of junk food eg.chips,beefburgers,hotdogs and sausages.Some people prefer to eat salads and ice-cream,especially in hot weather.Strawberries and fruits are also very popular. The most popular electrical goods are washing machines,vacuum cleaners and refrigerators.Most people prefer electricity to gas.Only part of Linton is connected to town gas.
